This Privacy Policy was last updated 20230123, please take some time to familiarize yourself with the privacy policy of the software and contact the developer if you have any questions. 

About 
developersn MX, Mingxing, MX2546140156 (hereinafter referred to as "developers" or "we") are all individual non-enterprise developers, and developers take your privacy very seriously. This Privacy Policy has been developed with your needs in mind. 

About privacy 
informationnSince our software does not have any permission requests, it is impossible to obtain your private information, please rest assured during use. Finally, we want to give you the best experience. If you have any questions about the data processing practices described in this Privacy Policy, please contact us using the contact details on in order to process your particular needs. We are happy to receive your feedback.
